hypothesis_content.title: Trump-Themed Memecoin Volatility Compression Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: When TRUMP (MAGA) token experiences 3 consecutive days of declining volatility (ATR < 50% of 10-day average) during NEUTRAL/BULL regimes, a volatility expansion event will occur within 5 days, with directional bias following BTC's 4-hour trend at breakout.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Politically-themed memecoins experience episodic volatility clustering. Extended compression periods typically resolve with explosive moves, especially when aligned with broader crypto market direction. Low float + concentrated ownership amplifies breakout momentum.
entry_conditions: BTC 4-hour trend clearly established (EMA9 > EMA21 for long, opposite for short)

exit_conditions.take_profit: ATR expands to >150% of pre-breakout level

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Volatility remains compressed beyond 5 days, or breakout occurs counter to BTC trend and immediately reverses.
